#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Note.

== Name ==

Note (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Note (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Generic type for addition of comments and/or rating.
			The text of the note is localised to a xml language.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  rating = [SRating.html Rating.html]>  comment+  </...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CLocalisedText.html golfml:LocalisedText] || [CLocalisedText.html comment] ||  					Localised, textual comment about the parent entitiy.				 ||      

=== Attribute Summary ===
        
|| [SRating.html golfml:Rating] || `rating` ||  Simple rating of the parent entitiy. ||

=== Attribute Detail ===
      

==== rating ====

      
				Simple rating of the parent entitiy. Always optional.
			
=====  Type: =====

          [SRating.html golfml:Rating]
=====  Use: =====
        optional
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
----
  

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CCountryClub.html CountryClub], [CGolfCourse.html GolfCourse], [CHole.html Hole], [CPlayer.html Player], [CStrokeDetail.html StrokeDetail]
